ing: 1/2 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1/4 cup chopped cilantro, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is yummy dish from a great friend. I hated avocado with a capital 'H,' and this made me love it. It is a great party appetizer or a quick weeknight meal for one. Eat by itself or serve with pita bread or tortilla chips."
ins: Mix avocado, corn, cilantro, lemon juice, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; let sit 5 minutes before serving.
